channel.title: Afk - Afkoff Cmds
channel.description:
Can someone help me making a 'afk' commands and 'afkoff' commands please like it make you sit on a chair or something so people dont ask you or talk you, they can you you are afk.
Rep++ if you help.

item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Yay thanks man finaly for it also need help with my magic timer so can you have a look at my thread? thanks http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438307.0.html

item.title: Afk - Afkoff Cmds
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“blitz ags, post:12, topic:341902”]Sorry i’m a really bad poop and i don’t really understand what to do…

client.java:10056: unreachable statement plrText = "I'm afk."; ^ 1 error Finished! Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...

client.java:10056: cannot find symbol symbol : variable txt4 location: class client txt4 = "I'm afk."; ^ 1 error Finished! Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...[/quote]

You can’t use the ‘return’ expression…:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("afk")) { setAnimation(1352); plrText = "I'm afk."; }

Read full topic

client.java:10056: cannot find symbol symbol : variable txt4 location: class client txt4 = "I'm afk."; ^ 1 error Finished! Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...

item.title: Afk - Afkoff Cmds
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“blitz ags, post:10, topic:341902”]???

client.java:10056: cannot find symbol symbol : method txt4(java.lang.String) location: class client txt4("I'm afk."); ^ 1 error Finished! Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...

???[/quote]

You’re invoking it like it’s a method when it isn’t. Read my updated post.

Read full topic

item.title: Afk - Afkoff Cmds
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

If I remember correctly you have to use either the ‘txt4’ or ‘plrText’ String, like so:

txt4 = "...";

or:

plrText = "...";

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:

client.java:10056: unreachable statement sM("I'm afk."); ^ 1 error Finished! Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...

client.java:10056: cannot find symbol symbol : method plrText(java.lang.String) location: class client plrText("I'm afk."); ^ 1 error Finished! Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...

item.title: Afk - Afkoff Cmds
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:4, topic:341902”]umm ok this might work

if(command.startsWith("afk")) { setAnimation(1352); return; sM("I'm afk") }

afk and afkoff commands enjoy[/quote]
After return;, the sM method would be unreachable. Also, instead of sM(“I’m afk”), try plrText or whatever the method is.

Read full topic

item.title: Afk - Afkoff Cmds
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

umm ok this might work

if(command.startsWith("afk")) { setAnimation(1352); return; sM("I'm afk") }

if(command.startsWith("afkoff")) { resetAnimation(); sM("I'm not afk") }

afk and afkoff commands enjoy

Read full topic
